rules.1: Be nice; do not act rude to other people
rules.3: No disruptive behaviour (i.e spam, forcing roleplays, getting too personal etc.)
rules.7: Sharing links to piracy sites and/or downloads is not allowed
rules.8: Be respectful to creators; discouragement is not allowed
rules.9: Always ask for permission to use assets from creators; stealing is strictly forbidden
rules.11: No one-sided politics and/or rage bait
rules.12: Finding loopholes to any of the above rules is prohibited

en.label: English ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸
en.message: Welcome! Can you type the text of rule no. **{equation}** to get entry? This is an English only server so once you do get entry, stick to English only, thank you!
en.error: Incorrect rule text. Please check punctuation, spaces, and the calculated number and make sure it is in English.
en.hint: *(Copy and paste the rule text exactly as shown in the rules list which should also be in English)*

tl.label: Filipino ğŸ‡µğŸ‡­ (by exoduswalker_)
tl.message: Maligayang pagdating! Maaari mo bang i-type ang teksto ng rule no. **{equation}** upang makapasok? Ingles lamang ang maaring gamitin sa server na ito, kaya kapag nakapasok ka na ay pakiusap na Ingles lang ang iyong gamiting wika. Salamat!

tl.hint: *(Kopyahin at i-paste ang teksto ng rule nang eksakto kung paano ito ipinapakita sa listahan, na dapat ay nasa English din)*
